column1: Norpramin is a type of drug called a tricyclic antidepressant.
Norpramin is the brand name for a medicine called desipramine.

The person may receive: - Activated charcoal - Airway support, including oxygen, breathing tube through the mouth (intubation), and breathing machine (ventilator) - Blood and urine tests - Chest x-ray - EKG (electrocardiogram, or heart tracing) - Fluids through a vein (intravenous or IV) - Laxative - Medicines to treat signs and symptoms
